segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's just making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the water, and it's just spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids trying to get cookies from the jar, being so careful not to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over, and that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and make things even worse than they already are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, looking so innocent and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water or the kids, she must be really distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and calm, unlike the mess in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something about this situation, it's getting out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR
